Wondrous item, legendary (requires attunement)
This fragmentary black book contains puzzling guidelines for frightful necromantic rituals and maddening interdimensional travel.
The book holds the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPsemblanceofdre]{semblance of dread}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPectoplasm00000]{ectoplasm}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.qFg34HYHnA4Qlxvd]{animate dead}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.er0d27qCTrTZkpu1]{speak with dead}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPemanationofyot]{emanation of Yoth}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPgreendecay0000]{green decay}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPyellowsign0000]{yellow sign}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPeldritchcommun]{eldritch communion}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.R1SUsXBHIrhyoX13]{create undead}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.j7MxoOVIYt1qEq1W]{gate}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.oA6apqbpPhODO1Uc]{harm}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.vYeBCI3A8Qa64KuS]{astral projection}, and @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPvoidrift000000]{Void rift}.
If you are attuned to this book, you can use it as a spellbook and as an arcane focus. In addition, while holding the book, you can use a bonus action to cast a necromancy spell that is written in this tome without expending a spell slot or using any verbal or somatic components. Once used, this property of the book canâ€™t be used again until the next dawn.
